snippet: On the eve of France’s presidential election, Rendezvous’s editor, Marcus Mabry, takes a very personal trip back to his roots with a French television crew to explore the nature of opportunity in today’s France.
abstract: On the eve of France’s presidential election, Rendezvous’s editor, Marcus Mabry, takes a very personal trip back to his roots with a French television crew to explore the nature of opportunity in today’s France.

headline.main: Equality and Fraternity Through the Eyes of an American in Paris
